resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105343</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105343</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206328</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Civil Rights Act of 1964 and the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zivilrecht-Tat von 1964 und die gleiche 
Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit-Kommission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Loi de droits civiques de 1964 et la Commission
égale d'offre d'emploi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ato das direitas civis de 1964 e o commission 
igual da oportunidade de emprego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Legge di diritti civili di 1964 e la 
Commissione uguale di possibilità d'impiego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο νόμος αστικών δικαιωμάτων του 1964 και η ίση 
Επιτροπή ευκαιρίας απασχόλησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El acto de las derechas civiles de 1964 y la 
Comisión igual de posibilidad de empleo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides a summary, history, and teaching activities related to the EEOC and this historic law, which forbade discrimination on the basis of sex as well as race in hiring, promoting, and firing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt eine Zusammenfassung, eine Geschichte und 
unterrichtende Aktivitäten, die auf dem EEOC und diesem historischen 
Gesetz in Verbindung gestanden werden zur Verfügung, die 
Unterscheidung auf der Grundlage von Geschlecht sowie Rennen beim der 
Einstellung, der Förderung und Abfeuern verboten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit un sommaire, une histoire, et des 
activités d'enseignement liées à l'EEOC et à cette loi historique,
qui ont interdit la discrimination sur la base du sexe aussi bien que 
la course en louant, en favorisant, et en mettant le feu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece um sumário, um history, e umas atividades
ensinando relacionadas ao EEOC e a esta lei historic, que proibiram a 
discriminação na base do sexo as.well.as a raça em empregar, em 
promover, e em atear fogo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce un sommario, una storia e lle attività 
d'istruzione relative al EEOC ed a questa legge storica, che hanno 
proibito alla distinzione in base al sesso così come la corsa 
nell'assumere, nella promozione e nell'infornamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει μια περίληψη, μια ιστορία, και τις 
δραστηριότητες διδασκαλίας σχετικές με το EEOC και αυτόν τον 
ιστορικό νόμο, οι οποίοι απαγόρευσαν τη διάκριση βάσει του 
φύλου καθώς επίσης και τη φυλή στη μίσθωση, την προαγωγή, και 
την πυρκαγιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a un resumen, a una historia, y a 
actividades de enseñanza relacionadas con el EEOC y esta ley 
histórica, que prohibieron la discriminación en base de sexo así 
como la raza en emplear, promover, y encender.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206328</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105343</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-civil-rights-act-of-1964-and-the-equal-employment-opportunity-commission</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
